title: Are there any sad emo rap, alternative artists like XXXTentacion? - Quora

response.answer_text: JCole has a lotta songs that are quite ‘emo’. In these tracks he mostly raps about his regrets, the things he misses, things he should’ve done, hood beef etc. Here’s a list Lost ones  Breakdown  Deja Vu  there’s more but this is the first three that popped into my head
